chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: The Enterprise Service Bus (ESB) has always been the cornerstone of every vendorâ€™s SOA strategy. In the past, however, ESBs have often failed to help leverage on the full value of SOA. This was due to their large footprint, the centralized architecture, and the considerable effort required to properly integrate them into an existing application landscape.

In Getting Started Guide you can learn about Talend ESB/CXF. This guide contains the simplified real-world example. This example from the domain of car rental companies demonstrate the use of Talend ESB for the develop and run services.

You can learn the purpose of the Rent a Car Demo. You can found how to compiled Rent a Car Demo, deploy it into Talend-sf OSGi container and run. Also You can learn how to enable the Service Locator Component for the Rent a Car demo.

chapter.title: Compilation and deployment of the Rent a Car demo
How to run Rent a Car demo

section.title: Use Case Scenario to Rent a Car
section.para: A customer enters prerequisite data into a form such as her name, the pick-up and return dates, the preferred type of rental rates, and submits her query.
Next, the application calls the CRMService to retrieve the customer data and customer status information.
The customer is presented with a list of the available cars and selects one from the presented list of results.
Finally, the application calls the ReservationService to submit the reservation request and then displays a reservation confirmation notice to the customer.

section.title: Starting the application
section.para: ReservationService, CRMService and App-reservation is already deployed in Talend-sf. Start OSGi console.
In console you will see text:

simplelist.member: car:search {user} {pickupDate} {returnDate} (Search for cars to rent, date format yyyy/mm/dd)
car:rent {pos} (Rent a car listed in search result of carSearch)

section.title: Using TALEND ESB Rental Client GUI
section.para: To start the GUI, type car:GUI in the console window.
Select aebert from the drop-down box.
Click Find to see the results. You will see list of available cars.
Click the highlighted line or select any other option and click Reserve.
You can now see confirmation page.
Click Close to stop the GUI.
